about_the_game:
Destination Unknown is a fast-paced single-player spaceship shooter with a massive exploration of space galaxies. Vicious encounters and brutal challenges stand between you and mining resources and building up your ship and space station. Explore the war-torn star systems — where vicious encounters with enemies and brutal challenges with bullet hell bosses.

Game modes

- Journey – explore 200+ planets, mine resources, and craft upgrades for your ship and space station
- Battle – survive 20 waves and an end boss all while testing your ship upgrades and skills in killing enemies

Journey Mode Features


  • Discover alien planets, unveil mysteries, find hidden planets and space stations, and defend your station and ship against enemies in an exciting 30-hour campaign.
  • Upgrade your ship and forge equipment with collected gems and resources.
  • Explore and unravel the mysteries of 200+ planets. Each play-through will feature different enemies, events, and results to your decisions. No two play-throughs will be quite the same. On death, start back at your space station with a basic ship again.
  • Minigames, side quests, and multiple storylines provide many hours of entertainment and varied gameplay.

Battle Mode Features


  • Survive waves of enemies lasting 30 to 60 seconds each by purchasing upgrades and avoiding enemies
  • 5 Auto-firing weapons by default with a manual aiming option on each individual weapon
  • Fast runs (under 30 minutes)
  • Hundreds of upgrade stat items, weapons, and auras to choose from (Ion Beam Prism, Flak Cannon, Meteor Missiles, Shield, Burn Aura, and many more)
  • Survive the end boss by dodging incoming bullet-hell-like attacks!

Vicious encounters and brutal challenges stand between you and mining resources and building up your ship and space station. mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14+ (Mojave)
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12 (Monterey)
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz 6-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X 4 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Destination Unknown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Destination Unknown is a fast-paced single-player spaceship shooter with exploration in space galaxies, RPG elements, mini-games, mining, and crafting. Experience an adventure through a randomly generated universe filled with an exciting sci-fi story full of secrets, quests, and more.
